item.description: Chapter 2 Probability Distributions Chapter Structure Exponential family distributionï¼š Exponential family distribution has a fixed formed conjugate prior. Bernoulli distribution Conjugate Prior: Beta distribution One binary experiment: toss a coin Binomial distribution Conjugate Prior: Beta distribution N binary experiments: toss a coin many times Multinomial distribution Conjugate Prior: Dirichlet distribution Multiple value experiments: like throw the dice Gaussian Distribution Conjugate Prior of Mean: Gaussain distribution Conjugate Prior of Variance: Inverse Gamma distribution

item.title: FAQ
item.description: $\text{Q}_1$: Who are you? $A$: Hi, this is Jieming. I am currently a NUS DSML master, and a research engineer intern at A*STAR as well. My research interest focused on Adversarial Robustness and Multimodal Learning.
